title: Better, Cheaper, Facebook-ier - Oculus Quest 2 Unboxing
description: Thanks to Oculus for sponsoring this video! Learn more about their new Oculus Quest 2 at  #OculusPartner #OculusQuest2  The Oculus Quest2 is out and like last time it's a standalone VR system that doesn't need a PC to run it, but what else has changed?  Buy the Oculus Quest 2 On BestBuy (PAID LINK):   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
